Html:
I tried to use BibWord, but I have a Problem in Word 2013. With the Word 2013 Styles I can specify the pages in citations. As soon as I Change the style to one which is created with BibWord, the appropriate menu button disappears:



How can I activate These Buttons in BibWord Styles?

Thank you for an answer

I don't have Word 2013, so I can't say for sure. But one thing could be the hyperlinking feature of BibWord. Try disabling hyperlinking in your style.

In the XSL, very close to the top, there is:
<citation_as_link>yes</citation_as_link>
Try changing the yes to no and see if that fixes things.

Hi Yves
Thank you. That was the solution!
